author: tuyen4818
content:
the lodestar node propagating gossip message has no connected validator, and the message is `beacon_aggregate_and_proof` which is a core topic for all nodes to subscribe too, lodestar did not attest to that bad block.

there was an issue of js-gossipsub gossiping not validated messages, and that's the root cause of the issue, we will make a hot fix for that soon. Thanks <@476250636548308992> for this!
